snippet: The American Civil Liberties Union of Northern California and Lt. Gov. Gavin Newsom said that he would lead a panel on how the state can tax and regulate legal marijuana sales.
abstract: American Civil Liberties Union of Northern California and Lt Gov Gavin Newsom announce that he will lead a panel of medical, legal and law enforcement experts who plan to spend the next 18 to 24 months studying how the state can tax and regulate legal marijuana sales in an effective way.
lead_paragraph: The American Civil Liberties Union of Northern California and Lt. Gov. Gavin Newsom said that he would lead a panel on how the state can tax and regulate legal marijuana sales.
